questions.text: In the clear desert night, Paul feels extremely lucid, enough so that he has a waking dream.  During this waking dream he conjures up what name (a name that he will soon take as his own)?
questions.explanation:
Muad'Dib.

	From the appendix in the book 'Dune', here is the definition of 'Muad'dib': 'The adapted kangaroo mouse of Arrakis, a creature associated in the Fremen earth-spirit mythology with a design visible on the planet's second moon. This creature is admired by Fremen for its ability to survive in the open desert.'

questions.text: Paul and his mother must escape from the desert into the rocks, but to do so, Paul is required to utilize a device that sends rhythmic vibrations into the sand.  What is this device called, used to fool the sandworms of the desert?
questions.explanation:
Thumper.

	With a thumper providing a rhythmic vibration similar to a man walking, Paul and his mother can flee more easily.  Paul instructs his mother to 'walk without rhythm' so as not to attract the attentions of the sandworms.

questions.text: Making their way to the safety of the stony cliffs of Arrakis, Paul and his mother are soon confronted by a band of Fremen.  After an initial violent confrontation, they quickly make friends with these natives of Dune.  In particular, Paul is attracted to a young female named Chani.  What lovely actress plays Chani in the film?
questions.explanation:
Sean Young.

	Sean Young was just about as hot a commodity as you could find in Hollywood during the 1980s.  Besides 'Dune', she also appeared in films such as 'Stripes', 'Blade Runner', 'No Way Out' and 'Wall Street'.  'Dune' was only the fifth movie of her then-young career (no pun intended!).

questions.text: The leader of this small band of Fremen is a very tough warrior, but this doesn't stop lady Jessica from completely subduing him, using her Bene Gesserit powers.  What is the name of this powerfully built man who soon becomes a right-hand man of Paul Atreides?
questions.explanation:
Stilgar.

	Everett McGill, of 'Quest for Fire' and 'Brubaker' fame, plays Stilgar in 'Dune'.  Stilgar is not only a good warrior and leader, but also is a father figure to Chani.

questions.text: Upon introduction to the Fremen, Paul is given a secret name, to which the Fremen may refer to him.  What is this secret name?
questions.explanation:
Usul.

	Usul is a very honorable name that literally means 'strength of the base of a pillar'.  Paul is also referred to as Paul Muad'Dib.  Both names are already familiar to him, Usul from his dream sequences involving Chani and Muad'Dib from his recent waking vision.

questions.text: Each group of Fremen are organized into settlements or gatherings that are known by what term?
questions.explanation:
Sietch.

	Each Sietch is a safe place of gathering for bands of Fremen.  Within a Sietch, the Fremen are referred to by their secret names, thus Paul's secret name Usul.  Stilgar verifies to Paul that there are vast numbers of Sietches in existence.

questions.text: Within the Fremen community is a wise woman who is referred to in the film as a Reverend Mother.  What is the native Fremen term for this holy woman?
questions.explanation:
Sayyadina.

	In 'Dune', the Sayyadina connected with the Fremen Seitch that Paul has become attached to is named Ramallo.  This character is played by Italian actress Silvana Mangano.  This was Mangano's second-to-last career film, and the only English language film in which she appeared.

questions.text: In order to become a Reverend Mother, one must drink from the Water of Life.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Indeed, Lady Jessica eventually drinks the Water of Life and becomes the new Reverend Mother after Ramallo dies.  Paul must eventually drink the Water of Life too, though every man who has previously tried the Water of Life has died.

questions.text: Lady Jessica becomes pregnant after becoming the new Reverend Mother of the Fremen.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Actually, she is already pregnant when she consumes the Water of Life to become the new Reverend Mother.  This has the effect of making her daughter Alia a child version of a Reverend Mother, with all the same powers and knowledge usually only bestowed upon a Bene Gesserit sister of many years.

questions.text: While with the Fremen, Lady Jessica gives birth to her daughter Alia.  What successful actress of the 1990s and 2000s appears in her first film here as the child Alia?
questions.explanation:
Alicia Witt.

	Alicia Witt was only 8 years old when she appeared in 'Dune', her first film.  She would go on to appear in such films as 'Mr. Holland's Opus', 'Vanilla Sky' and 'The Upside of Anger'.
